data.name: Joy Pools
data.address: 5002 S Stemmons Fwy, Lake Dallas, TX 75065

reviews.text: Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.
"The price, quality and service is top notch!" "Company customer service is not there." "That gave me confidence in my selection."

Joy Pools has built 2 of our pools, and we have been very happy with the building process, customer service, and maintenance. Their entire team is an absolute delight to deal with. Todd, Cyndy, Lydna, Diane, and the whole crew are very … More Response from the owner 5 months ago Thank you so much for that amazing review.  We are delighted to hear that you are happy with your new (2nd) pool built with us.  You are a very valued customer to us and look forward to continuing this relationship!

We looked at 3 pool companies and picked Joy. They were not the lowest price and not the highest, but they were AMAZING to work with.  Their pool designer Todd took our ideas and created and fabulous concept. Their builders then executed it … More

From our first visit at the sales office, to the design phase, through construction, and on to final turnover… Todd, Reed, Terry, Diane, Greg, and the entire staff at Joy Pools treated us like we were their only customer. … More Response from the owner 7 months ago Thank you Chris for wonderful review!  It is an absolute pleasure having you as a customer.  We are so happy that you have the backyard resort paradise you want.  We will be here to help you with any of your future needs.
